tool_description: ~ An API is to retrieve information about superheroes.
name: Superhero Api
title: Superhero Api

api_list.name: Get Filtered Heros
api_list.description: Retrieve heroes by sorting, filtering, and selecting specific fields

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: You can specify the index number of the page you would like to view.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: You can specify a limit of one page with this field.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: You can specify which field you would like to receive in the response.

optional_parameters.name: numerics
optional_parameters.description: You can compare heroes using comparison operators such as >, <, =, >=, and <= to evaluate their **speed**, **power**, **intelligence**, and **more**.

api_list.name: Get random hero
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://superhero-api.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "superhero-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Hero
api_list.description: Search heros by there **name, short name or full name**.

api_list.name: Get hero By ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://superhero-api.p.rapidapi.com/id/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "superhero-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://superhero-api.p.rapidapi.com/id/{heroid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "superhero-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
